heading: We Offer the Following Services
subheading: Professional legal representation for all your immigration and refugee needs in Canada

services.title: Refugee Claims and Appeals
services.description: Complete representation at the Immigration Refugee Board, Refugee Appeal Division, and Federal Court of Canada.

services.title: Humanitarian & Compassionate Applications
services.description: Expert assistance with H&C applications for permanent residency, Pre-Risk Removal Assessments, and other applications to Immigration, Refugees, Citizenship Canada.

services.title: Sponsorship Applications
services.description: We may be able to assist you with sponsorship applications for permanent residence.

services.title: Study and Work Permits
services.description: We may be able to assist you with study and work permit applications and other immigration matters.

additionalInfo.title: Need Help with Something Else?
additionalInfo.description: We can also assist you with other immigration matters. If we are not able to help you, we can refer you to lawyers who can.
